test_strategy_covers_unit_integration_e2.notes: Unit (40 tests, 66%), Integration (15 tests, 25%), Backward Compatibility (6 tests, 9%). Performance budgets defined per function. Security covered via fail-open safety tests (FR-007). E2E not applicable (internal library functions, not user-facing endpoints).

test_cases_exist_for_all_requirements.notes: 61 test cases covering all 8 FRs (FR-001 through FR-008). Every FR has at least 3 test cases.

traceability_matrix_complete_100_percent.notes: 31/31 ACs mapped to specific test case IDs in test-traceability-matrix.csv. Each AC has at least one positive test and critical ACs have negative/boundary tests.

coverage_targets_defined.notes: 100% requirement coverage (all FRs), 100% AC coverage (31 ACs), >=1 positive test per AC, >=1 negative test per function, boundary conditions per function, all fail-open paths tested.

test_data_strategy_documented.notes: test-data-plan.md created with realistic fixtures (persona, topic, discovery, skill index), boundary values (22 boundary cases), invalid inputs (17 invalid input cases), maximum-size inputs (4 performance fixtures).

critical_paths_identified.notes: 4 critical paths identified: (1) Persona tightening correctness, (2) Orchestrator extraction compatibility, (3) Skill index parsability, (4) Fail-open safety.

article_II_test_first.notes: All 61 test cases designed before implementation (Phase 05 before Phase 06). Test strategy covers unit, integration, backward compatibility with defined coverage targets.

article_VII_artifact_traceability.notes: test-traceability-matrix.csv maps all 31 ACs to 61 test cases. No orphan tests (every test traces to an AC). No orphan requirements (every AC has at least one test).

article_IX_quality_gate_integrity.notes: All required artifacts exist: test-strategy.md, test-cases.md, test-traceability-matrix.csv, test-data-plan.md. All gate checklist items pass.

article_XI_integration_testing.notes: 15 integration tests validate component interactions (SKILL_INDEX section assembly, ROUNDTABLE_CONTEXT integration, DISCOVERY_CONTEXT integration, cross-section independence, verbose reporting). Backward compatibility tests (6) validate downstream consumer parsing.
